pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; Chemical-resistant gloves made of any waterproof material including polyethylene or polyvinyl chloride; Shoes plus socks.

Safety_Information.general_Info: Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor, or going for treatment.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by a poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: For 24-Hour Medical Emergency Assistance Call ROCKY MOUNTAIN POISON AND DRUG SAFETY: 1-866-673-6671.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 6 pints per acre per crop cycle per year
Application_Info.max_applications_per_season: 5 applications per crop cycle per year
5 applications per crop cycle per year

Target_Disease_Pest.name: Pythium root rots and seedling diseases
